title: The Bell Pepper Bandit
overview: A kid staying home alone gets robbed for his most valuable possession.
tagline: HOW FAR WOULD YOU GO TO TAKE BACK WHAT IS YOURS?

title: Should Be Long Gone
overview: Part one of a two-part Crime/Comedy story that tells the tale of what happens when a boring, probably-stoppable object meets a self-proclaimed unstoppable force.
tagline: An elite gangster's most powerful adversary proves to be...just some guy.

title: Oye Chandigarh Chaliye
overview: Four friends from a village dream of shifting to Chandigarh to live a luxurious life. Little do they know their plan will backfire, and they will find themselves pulled into a life of crime.

title: HotGirlz
overview: A trio of for hire thieves in L.A. try to take control.

title: Pipe Dreams
overview: A teen boy is taken aback by a mischievous girl.

title: LOOT: A COVID-19 Lock-Down Story
overview: During the COVID-19 lock-down a normally law abiding citizen must do whatever it takes to ensure his family's survival

title: Mofle
overview: After the accidental death of his opponent in a clandestine motorcycle race, Jimmy is left indebted and threatened by Milito, his town's gang leader. With an ultimatum over the fate of his daughter, Jimmy will do whatever it takes to solve this problem.

title: Copping Justice
overview: After being told by her assignment partner, Ben, to “think more like a man”, a flustered investigative journalism student, Maggie Thompson, imagines herself as the male protagonist of a 1970s cop show working on their project in real-time.
tagline: Alright boys, it's time for copping justice.

title: Waikiki PD
overview: Waikiki PD follows Officer Ha Ming's inadvertent rise in the ranks from lowly dispatcher to being a "real" cop in Hawaii's worst police department. He stumbles upon a huge network of illegal smuggling. The officers of Waikiki PD must take down this group of Russian mobsters.

title: Orio Stories: Casino Urial
overview: Nino is an Italian Alpine trooper with a big debt towards the "Circolo", a card-playing club run by a despicable gang of criminals. Banned from the Circolo, he comes back anyways and learns the hard lesson: when you owe something to the Circolo, you must pay!
tagline: "You know you shouldn't have come back..."

title: Love Hate Dhoka
overview: Love Hate Dhoka is a Bengali movie released on 14 Feb, 2020. The movie is directed by Chiranjit Ghoshal and featured Biswajit Chakraborty, Sudip Mukherjee, Diganto Bagchi and Reshmi Bhattacharya as lead characters.
tagline: Love Hate Dhoka

title: Shlonkin
overview: Two police officers are called to a nearby school to stop three degenerate teenagers from doing something unthinkable, shlonking
tagline: NEVER SHLONK ON A LEAP YEAR

title: Al-Tahlea robbery
overview: After his father's restaurant gets robbed, Yazeed and his three friends went to investigate with the restaurant's staff.

title: Decisions 2
overview: Gotti's life changed for the better when he left Baltimore and the drug business behind. When he returns to the city, things spin out of control.

title: The Tale of Billy O’c
overview: The Tale of Billy O'C is a psychological crime thriller strongly focused on an unpredictable plot with twists keeping the audience wanting to know what happens next. It's a story of vilification, family dedication, redemption and a desire for peace. Set in a small village in County Kilkenny, Ireland in 1975, it unfolds with a backdrop of an IRA safehouse and small-town politics.

title: Raoul
overview: A troublesome young man embarks on a warped odyssey through his small town, all to acquire the perfect birthday gift for his best friend, Raoul.
tagline: You're too good to me, man!

title: The Art of the Deal
overview: A struggling real estate developer has one last shot to save his career - but will his newfound obsession with Donald Trump's hit book The Art of the Deal lead to his downfall?
tagline: "Best actor in the class" - Roger Ebert

title: In Search of Meaning
overview: Anthony Hudson, a murderer with a rare ilness, searches for the meaning of life by killing victims.

title: Zura
overview: Prosecutor Ganzorig will fight against political authorities.

title: It smells of shit, it smells of being
overview: Ximena has been a victim of sexual abuse. The investigation of his case seeks to find the responsible. Carlos, Ximena's husband, is the one who encourages the case to be resolve. The investigation finds the crime scene and the presumed responsible. However, Carlos does not have the money that the prosecutor asks for sentence those allegedly responsible.

title: Strangers To Betrayal
overview: A man is challenged to go against his faith to save his reputation

title: What Now?
overview: A cocky detective's relentless interrogation of a known criminal for a heist he hasn't even done yet plunges both into a treacherous mind game of manipulation and hidden motives, blurring the lines between truth and deception.
tagline: I guess my next question is...

title: Saayai
overview: Starring Mukesh Kumar & KK

title: Case #3809 - The Eldritch Mortician
overview: On this next crime story, a naive, ditsy 7-year old girl curiously stumbles upon a mortician's private stash of questionable, yet controversial personal treasures. This event may be the last discovery of her life.

title: Sizzler '77
overview: In the summer of 1977, a group of working girls are being coerced by a mysterious and sinister pimp Bossy Jim and his young partner Chaka, to become involved in a profit-share scheme.

title: Detective Jacqueline: Babushka
overview: Adapted from the Instagram webcomic of the same name, this crime noir/sci-fi horror written and animated by reagle, depicts the famous Detective Jacqueline interrogating a suspected serial child kidnapper, Mathilda Uzodinma, a 73 year old fruit seller which takes on a horrifyingly, disturbing twist.

title: Bicho Vivo
overview: Life does not ask for permission

title: The Game
overview: A man has a bad run in with the mob and has to play a game for a chance to live.

title: Mimamsa
overview: Mimamsa is a crime thriller set against the backdrop of the mystical city of Bhopal, the capital of Madhya Pradesh- but also a city that conceals many shadows in its ancient walls.

title: Overheat
overview: Join Jack as he makes it through life and conflict in the streets of Los Angeles on the one thing he feels makes him free.
tagline: Redline Run

title: Criminal Crime
overview: A gem thief leads a maddening, fast paced chase against a detective.

title: Guilty
overview: The niece of prominent politician Jamsrang was kidnapped. A special team of Majors Zelme and Buyan will be ordered to investigate the case. The clues found by the detectives lead them to an unexpected case.

title: Ms. Justice
overview: A female ex-soldier returns home to become a violent agent of revenge for wronged women.
tagline: JUSTICE IS SERVED... HER WAY.

title: Out Cast
overview: A mysterious and bizarre story about a false love obsession beyond a friendship that deals with Su-hyun, a victim of school violence in high school, and Su-ji's guilt that she couldn't protect as a friend.

title: A wave
overview: A young man chases a young woman to discover the content of a briefcase.

title: Tiro Certo Rio em Chamas
overview: An experimental Brazillian action film with 30 minutes of length.

title: Finger Lickin the SHOW - "The Break In" PART TWO
overview: Seeking YouTube fame, Seamus and Travis found themselves caught in a money laundering scheme run by the "Mexican Drug Cartel". After a break-in and subsequent abduction, the two were interrogated but managed to escape, and "dissolve" the bodies of their captors. Now the question is, should they prepare for another BREAK-IN? I... would assume... since this is PART TWO... but... you should still watch this...
tagline: GUN CHUCKS?!?!

title: It Only Spreads
overview: It Only Spreads follows the inner monologue of a mild-mannered psychopath grappling with violent tendencies.

title: Pusoy Dos
overview: Two teenage hustlers messed with the wrong authority. Jean and Michel attempted a theft to the most feared syndicate leader at their locality. The theft went to a downward spiral after being caught in action, breaking an antique owned by the syndicate leader, that caused the two teenagers a huge debt. Things also got worse after being mixed up with the syndicate leader's drug industry, putting the lives of Jean and Michel in the verge of death.
tagline: pusoydos2023

title: INMATES
overview: In the underbelly of the posh Bukit Bintang, a man deep in debt tracks down the pickpocket who stole his money. A homeless man gets dragged into the chaos which escalates into a violent brawl, revealing surprising truths about their predicaments.

title: Tummyache
overview: A workplace accident causes a rift between friends.

title: Reseda
overview: When 23 year old drug dealer, Syl Goetzman loses an ounce of weed he owes to the son of a mob boss, he scrambles to find it in time before they kill him.
tagline: A day in the life of the most idiotic drug dealer of all time.

title: VICTIMLESS
overview: The story of a man whose extreme boredom drives him to a life of crime.
tagline: Breaking the Law

title: Ten-Love
overview: After a robbery in the streets of Porto Alegre, Georgia and Bruno will have their lives intertwined by a tennis game orchestrated by the mysterious Jeweler.

title: Chocolate Bar Thief
overview: A thief chickens out of robbing a gas station so he steals a car instead, little does he know there's a surprise waiting in the backseat...
tagline: Thief’s First Heist Goes Terribly Wrong

title: Hitman's Gambit
overview: In order to be productive at work, you must remember to bring the right tools for the job.

title: NETIVIM
overview: Major Aviad Zilber is an anxious military man going out to celebrate the reception of a new rank. A dreadful turn of events lead him on a midnight journey that bounds the thin line between reality and a nightmare.

title: Backslide
overview: After creating an e-liquid from a mysterious set of instructions they found on the dark web, Ryan, a highly intelligent high schooler, and Justin, not so much, decide to team up once again and spend their summer vacation making "real money."

title: Death of a Chef
overview: The Old Chef has been prisoned and will soon be executed. Determined to uncover the truth, his apprentice, the Young Chef, realizes that the Last Supper could be his only chance to reach his fellow master before it is too late…

title: TAPEMAN
overview: Eddie, a freelance detective is solving a serial murder case committed by TapeMan. During the investigation process, he is trapped between the world of hallucinations and reality

title: Working Title
overview: An addict comes to realize that he needs to make a change in his life. But will he go too far to change?

title: I Need It
overview: A teenager kleptomaniac steals stuff.
tagline: Swipe and run

title: Risk Society
overview: Young-gil, a courier driver, wins a lot of money at a casino and proposes to Harim. After a while, he entrusts the truck to the pawnbroker Jeong-seop and returns to Seoul, losing even the 10 million won he borrowed. Young-gil eventually loses 10 million won borrowed from Harim's mother. Hitchhiking with a promise to get to Harim quickly, Young-gil gets into Jin-su's car. Yeong-gil rolls around Jin-su in the field to steal his handbag and car. Young-gil, who decides to drive to Samcheok as an apology and suggestion for Jin-su, finds the body of Jeong-seop in the trunk of his car.

title: Resolution
overview: Haunted by the videos from his deceased daughter's camcorder, a man is resolved to revenge her death.

title: Red Lightning
overview: In 1972, a neo-nazi movement has taken the city by storm. A brutal vigilante decides to clean things up.
tagline: Fight till the last drop of blood!

title: Daydream
overview: A nightmare unfolds in this short film about a man infiltrating the dreams of a mysterious woman.
tagline: They say every dream has a meaning

title: Hacker 2.0
overview: A Short Film based on phishing, hacking. We wanted to spread awesomeness of preventing Hack.
tagline: Hacker 2.0

title: Who Killed Fereydoun Farrokhzad?
overview: Almost three decades after his grisly killing in Germany, the murder of the exiled Iranian entertainer Fereydoun Farrokhzad remains officially unsolved. But an investigation by RFE/RL's Persian-language service, Radio Farda, has uncovered documents that point to Iran's intelligence services. And a former Iranian spy has revealed a possible suspect in the 1992 slaying of the outspoken critic of Iran's hard-line Islamic regime.

title: 24 Hours Homeless in Compton!
overview: Danny Mullen and his crew spend 24 hours in Compton in this eye opening documentary. It showcases American culture at its most raw, while also being funny and entertaining.
tagline: Disclaimer: I'm a comedian and this is all satire. None of this content is intended to be hurtful, and all jokes and scenarios are intended to be purely comedic.

title: Balls Out
overview: After hitting a baseball through a window, Silas Bridgewell is framed for murder of his neighbor. So it's up to Detective Solomon Gaines to prove his innocence.

title: Feu De Pneu
overview: When news breaks that one of the world’s largest energy companies is illegally burning tires, a secret agent goes undercover to expose the truth and bring their operation down. As the investigation unfolds, the agent’s identity remains a mystery, with subtle clues dropped throughout—but cleverly designed so anyone could be the detective. Will the Company be taken down?

title: The Drongo
overview: A green-haired street dweller and his camera wielding sidekick find themselves in over their heads as they investigate a friend's disappearance.

title: The Red Eclipse!
overview: The Red Eclipse! is an animated short by Insane Inkorporated about a group of villains plotting against a common adversary, the Red Eclipse.

title: DÉTECTIVE MANO 2 - LE RETOUR DE LA VENGEANCE
Who Murdered Professor Black?
overview: Two criminal justice students investigate the murder of their law professor.
tagline: What goes around, comes around.

title: The Church Boy That Sinned
overview: Joey, the church boy, drops out of school to follow Bill into a ‘cooler’ lifestyle, until he mixes with the wrong people, and commits the worst sin of all...
tagline: Faith is made to be broken

title: End Times
overview: Two thieves hatch a plan to steal the allegedly eight million peso cash that one of their member happen to score.

title: Grasping at straws
overview: Jay works as a staff at a guest house and trades virtual currency at night. He proposes a plan to deliberately lower the coin price and raise it again on the promised day. A long-term guest at the guest house, Bandal, invests in his plan. But the movement of the chart is unusual.

title: No Mercy
overview: Where greed hides in the shadow of poverty, the monster lies in wait for people. If there is a wrong step while walking in the dark, all dreams will end immediately. In that darkness you are either a victim ... or you are ... a hunter!

title: Conviction
overview: Short film directed by Reed Garber.

title: Baby, Don’t Cry
overview: Baby, A withdrawn and sensitive 17-year-old Chinese immigrant from a troubled home, is living in the outskirts of Seattle. One day, she meets a 20-year-old delinquent named Fox. Together they embark on a twisted journey to escape their hopeless fate.

title: Magenta
overview: «Elementary, my dear Cthulhu!» Sara stole an archaeological find : "The Magenta eye". When she realizes the paranormal properties of the stone, the only man who is able to helping her is a mystery consultant and his assistant.

title: Murder on High Street
overview: Two college stoners are turned detectives when their beloved bong, "Taz" goes missing in this film noir parody.
tagline: This crime will not go unpunished.

title: Abrupt Chaos
overview: In the aftermath of a murder, two desperate souls are stuck with the clean-up work. Unbeknownst to them, bad company is right around the corner.

title: Kids With Guns
overview: Kenzie is forced to live on  the street after a deal gone bad

title: Cult of Freedom
overview: Joshua is traveling from California to a rural state to live with his family. While making a rest stop at a nearby park, he encounters a mysterious group whose true nature is far darker than Joshua could ever imagine.

title: Murder at Carter County Mines
overview: A beloved couple goes missing from their rural Kentucky home, leaving behind a mysterious crime scene. Clues emerge across state lines sending investigators on a wild chase until an unlikely source reveals the shocking truth.

title: Groovin CD's
overview: Come visit Groovin CD’s, the greatest CD Store of all time.
tagline: Come groove with us

title: Closing Time
overview: A lone young man robs a convience store at night. We follow him throughout the night as he tries to make his way home.

title: The Kidnap & Murder of Lynda Spence
overview: After financial adviser Lynda Spence disappears, police uncover a woman with multiple identities and links to organized crime.

title: Night Stalker: Terror in a Small Town
overview: Exploring how it took over 20 years, and the work of FBI profilers and British forensic experts, to uncover the identity of a killer who left behind a trail of rape and murder in Australia.

title: The Murder on Alibegova Street
overview: The story of a doomed polycule from Minsk.

title: J005311
overview: Kanzaki, a businessman who despairs of life, witnesses a purse snatching by Yamamoto, a young man in the same situation. He asks Yamamoto to drive him to a certain location for a high fee. What is the destination of their painful and strange journey?

title: Buy 1 Get 1 Free
overview: Two twins con people and make a living in the city, an unknown call takes to them historical place and encounter with Manmatha changes their life forever.
